item.title: Build a Pushup counter app with OpenCV and Deep learning
item.description: Since 2019, the raging COVID-19 epidemic has claimed the lives of many people and forced many countries to take measures to blockade and isolate. Exercising at home is becoming a new way to improve people's health and protect them from the Corona virus. Many people responded to the 30-day push-ups challenge with the hashtag #pushupchallenge on social networks as a way to encourage each other to take some physical activities. My team has designed and built a desktop app that can analyze and count the number of pushups.
